reviewText: Able to learn at a nice pace, easy to follow.
Great DVD.  You need to follow along closely to see what the Chef is doing.  I am happy with this purchase.

My sister and i love this video  we enjoyed  all the beautiful arrangements . I have all three videos  ultimate creations video, the basics and also the dare to cook food carving video , i rate all 3 videos a perfect 10 star . Can't  wait to buy more of ray duey videos ( encore applause you have two new fans ).Thanks

If you are serious about learning this great craft this is the man to learn from. I have bought all his videos and have to say that Chef Ray is a great teacher for this craft. Great humor and great instruction that is easy to learn and understand.

Got it as a present for someone who is interested in food carving. HIgh quality DVD with easy to follow instruction. The pace is good as well - not too fast so you can understand what is being tought.
